page.title: 11A DAY IN THE LIFE OF PHILIP
page.content: Philip wakes up at 7.15 on a school day. He goes downstairs and watches Popeye on breakfast television. He gets the newspaper and reads the T.V and sports pages and also does the quiz. He then goes into the kitchen to have his breakfast and listen to the radio. Philip then gets washed, dressed and cleans his teeth. He then waits for Mrs Makriel to take him to school. He arrives at school at 8.50 and goes inside to read his book. At playtime Philip plays tag with a friend. For dinner he brings a packed lunch of sandwiches and a drink. After school Philip plays cricket with his father and after watering his sunflowers he watches television and has his tea. He watches more T.V until he goes to bed at about 9.30 pm.
